item.title: Carrot cake with cookie and cocoa base
item.description: Slice the carrots and boil them in a little water for about 15 minutes until soft. Drain well and let them cool. Crush the cookies into fine crumbs. Mix them with the melted butter and cocoa powder until you get a uniform dough. Press this mixture firmly into the bottom of a rectangular tray or pan to form the base. Chill in the fridge.
